title: Ace JavaScript Interviews: Scoping and Hoisting
description: Back to basics of JavaScript. Informative, interesting and entertaining talk. Great knowledge refreshment for those who know JavaScript. Essential education for those who never learned JavaScript properly. Node.js Developer. Web Development Trainer. Looking for new opportunities. @foxreymann
name: Fox Reymann

title: Event Driven Architecture
description: When Node.Js says "event-driven, non-blocking I/O", have you ever felt it was some sort of black magic? Well in this talk we'll make the magic go away by implementing our own simple HTTP server, Event Loop, Scheduler, Deferer/Promise and Thread Pool. Oh, Hi by the way! I'm Loïc (it's pronounced Low-ic), a "Lead Engineer" (read Lead Dev) at Constant Commerce. You'll find that I tweet and blog a lot about tech. I aslo contribute a bit to FOSS projects.
name: Lo√Øc Faugeron
